org.youscope.common.job

Interface Job

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AutoFocusJob, CellDetectionJob, ChangePositionJob, ComposedImagingJob, CompositeJob, ContinuousImagingJob, ControllerJob, CustomJob, DeviceSettingJob, DropletMicrofluidicJob, FluigentJob, FocusingJob, ImagingJob, LiveModifiableJob, NemesysJob, OnixJob, OutOfFocusJob, PlateScanningJob, RepeatJob, ScriptingJob, ShortContinuousImagingJob, SlimJob, StaggeringJob, StatisticsJob, WaitForUserJob, WaitJob
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditableJobContainerAdapter, JobAdapter

    public interface Job
extends Component
    Base class of all jobs.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Detail

      • addJobListener

        void addJobListener(JobListener listener)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds a listener which should e.g. be invoked after each evaluation of the job (at the end of the implementation of runJob().
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • removeJobListener

        void removeJobListener(JobListener listener)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Removes a previously added listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to be removed.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • executeJob

        void executeJob(ExecutionInformation executionInformation,
                Microscope microscope,
                MeasurementContext measurementContext)
         throws JobException,
                java.lang.InterruptedException,
                java.rmi.RemoteException
        Function which is called at every evaluation of the job. If this job contains child jobs, it is responsible to call their respective executeJob() methods. Should not be called directly by client applications.
        Parameters:
        executionInformation - Information about how many times the job has been executed, and if it is executed in a loop.
        microscope - Interface to control and get information of the microscope.
        measurementContext - the context of the measurement, allowing to transfer data between measurement components and similar.
        Throws:
        JobException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • initializeJob

        void initializeJob(Microscope microscope,
                   MeasurementContext measurementContext)
            throws JobException,
                   java.lang.InterruptedException,
                   java.rmi.RemoteException
        Called before the first evaluation of a job in a measurement. If this job contains child jobs, it is responsible to call their respective initializeJob() methods. Should not be called directly by client applications.
        Parameters:
        microscope - Interface to control and get information of the microscope.
        measurementContext - the context of the measurement, allowing to transfer data between measurement components and similar.
        Throws:
        JobException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • uninitializeJob

        void uninitializeJob(Microscope microscope,
                     MeasurementContext measurementContext)
              throws JobException,
                     java.lang.InterruptedException,
                     java.rmi.RemoteException
        Called before the first evaluation of a job in a measurement. If this job contains child jobs, it is responsible to call their respective uninitializeJob() methods. Should not be called directly by client applications. There is no guarantee that this method is called. Usually it is called when the measurement stops regularly, e.g. by timing out or when the user invokes "stop measurement". However, it is not invoked if the measurement is interrupted or similar.
        Parameters:
        microscope - Interface to control and get information of the microscope.
        measurementContext - the context of the measurement, allowing to transfer data between measurement components and similar.
        Throws:
        JobException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.rmi.RemoteException
